quotes.quote: I used to spend my nights out in a barroom / Liquor was the only love I've known / But you rescued me from reaching for the bottle / And you brought me back from being too far gone /  You're as smooth as Tennessee whiskey / You're as sweet as strawberry wine / You're as warm as a glass of brandy / And I stay stoned on your love all the time.
